title: Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania
description: Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania is a platform and party game developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and published by Sega. It is an enhanced remaster of the first three console entries in the Super Monkey Ball series, released in celebration of the series' 20th anniversary. A worldwide release is planned for October 5, 2021 for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and Microsoft Windows while the game releases in Japan and East Asia for non-Xbox platforms on October 7, 2021.
